property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Angel Commands and/or Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or fire spell in your hand for no cost. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons or Tyranno Drake. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if it's put on top of a Tyranno Drake, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if the card under it is a Dragon, you may destroy one of your opponent's non-Armored Dragon or non-Tyranno Drake creatures that has less power than this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other Dreammates in the battle zone gets +1000 power. ■ When this creature would battle, you may have your other Dreammates in the battle zone battle instead. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, if you have a Vehicle Bee in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD PLUS} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck under one of your shields face down. (Each card stack is still considered to be one shield.)) {SHIELD FORCE} (As you put this creature, you may choose one of your shields. While that shield is in your shield zone, this creature gets the following Shield Force abilities.) This creature gets +5500 power and "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less. If you have at least one Bolmeteus Musha Dragon in the battle zone, destroy one more of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever you put an Angel Command or a Dragon into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Over Drive—Light x1 Fire x1 (When you summon this creature, you may tap another 1 light and/or 1 fire card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gets the following {OVER DRIVE}: abilities.): {OVER DRIVE}: Light: This turn, ignore any effects that would prevent one of your creatures in the battle zone from attacking your opponent. {OVER DRIVE}: Fire: When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "Double breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
